original_text: At the place where they stopped for the night one of them opened his sack to get feed for his donkey, and he saw his silver in the mouth of his sack.
korean_text: 한 사람이 여관에서 나귀에게 먹이를 주려고 자루를 풀고 본즉 그 돈이 자루 아귀에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: At the place where they stopped for the night
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 밤을 지내기 위해 멈춘 곳에서

sentences.original_text: one of them opened his sack
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 자기 자루를 열었습니다

sentences.original_text: to get feed for his donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 나귀에게 먹일 사료를 얻기 위해

sentences.original_text: in the mouth of his sack
